Text:
Als eens gezien maar ga hem nog eens bekijken.

Toppie Thanks

This is identical to the other full DVD torrent.  Something is wrong with this rip.  In technical terms it looks like a non-terminated signal, where the light colors are completely blown out, and everything else is washed out.  It might not seem to bad if you didn't have a proper copy to compare it to, then you can see that it's a MAJOR problem.  I absolutely would NOT recommend this torrent to anyone, you're way better off downloading a 700MB XviD copy.  Also, this torrent took 2 or 3 days to download, only 1 or 2 seeders at any given time.
